sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you know the radical meaning <radical>lovely</radical>, you know the kanji meaning <kanji>lovely</kanji> as well!
meaningInfo: You know what would make learning this kanji lovely? Studying your radicals.
readingMnemonic: "<kanji>Lovely</kanji>" is the name of my <reading>ray</reading> (<ja>れい</ja>) gun. It's more lovely than any other thing.
readingInfo: Try to imagine feeling this way about your ray gun. It's so lovely.
